content: I just got off the phone with my oldest son, Robert, who is an active duty Regular Army Soldier deployed to COB Speicher, Iraq with the 101st Airborne, since end of November '08. Double good news... He started today his three day "Freedom Rest"... said it was like being in a POW camp where they wait on you hand and foot. He also was able to confirm he did get "R&R" end of next month...he'll be home for two weeks!!! Happy day for me! Robert
reply: I just got off the phone with my oldest son, Robert, who is an active duty Regular Army Soldier deployed to COB Speicher, Iraq with the 101st Airborne, since end of November '08. Double good news... He started today his three day "Freedom Rest"... said it was like being in a POW camp where they wait on you hand and foot. He also was able to confirm he did get "R&R" end of next month...he'll be home for two weeks!!! Happy day for me! Robert
title: HAPPY DAY!!!

content: Yep, Enjoy, Enjoy, Enjoy. I remember how it was when I got off the C-5 for a two week R&R from SEAsia. Gave my wife bruises with the hugs and injured her lips with the kisses. Seems like yesterday. God Bless your son and keep him safe!!!
